knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## Figure 3A - Consensus Coverage vs. Accuracy & Significance

```{r}
dat.3a <- read.csv("../New Data/misc/ens_consensus_aggregate.csv")
cov.3a <- as.numeric(sub("%","",dat.3a$Coverage))
```

```{r}
fit.3a.acc <- lm(dat.3a$Mean.Accuracy~cov.3a)
```

```{r}
plot(cov.3a,dat.3a$Mean.Accuracy)
```

```{r}
fit.3a.sig <- lm(dat.3a$Mean.Significance~cov.3a)
```

```{r}
plot(cov.3a,dat.3a$Mean.Significance)
```
